feature_bullets: ‚≠ê„ÄêSelf-Grounding & Single Pole„ÄëAIDA light switch can be automatically connected to a well-grounded metal wall junction box.Sleek decorative stylish appearance perfectly enhance your room looking. On/Off paddle rocker switches are easy to control.
‚≠ê„ÄêUniversal Application„ÄëSingle pole light wall switch suitable for residential use and most commercial areas that require only 15Amp switches.
‚≠ê„ÄêHigh Quality„ÄëDecorator electric switch is made of impact-resistant polycarbonate thermoplastic and solid steel, which is beautiful and durable.

‚≠ê„ÄêEasy Installation„ÄëAIDA Paddle Switch Provides both quick push-in wiring and side wiring. Quick wiring push-in terminals accept #14AWG solid copper wire only. Side wiring terminal screws accept wire up to #12AWG copper or copper-clad wire. Break-off plaster ear for best flush alignment. Shallow body design fits standard junction boxes.
‚≠ê„Äê100% Guarantee & Service„ÄëUL & CUL listed , Backed 30-days free return & free lifetime technical online support within 24 hours.

customers_say: Customers find the light switches work well, are easy to install, and offer good value for money. They like the appearance, with one customer noting the color matches their kitchen. However, the quality receives mixed feedback, with some finding them good quality while others describe them as cheap products. Additionally, several customers note that the color is not white as advertised.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.review_snippet: I‚Äôve had to replace many of them after only 2 years of use. The hinge is plastic and breaks. I‚Äôve also had some of the toggles themselves crack down the middle. Spend a little more for better quality.
